examples: He grasped my hand and shook it warmly.
Tomó mi mano y la estrechó cálidamente.
Kay grasped him by the wrist.
Kay lo agarró por la muñeca.
They failed to grasp the importance of his words.
No comprendieron la importancia de sus palabras.
She was unable to grasp how to do it.
Ella fue incapaz de comprender cómo hacerlo.
